title: Occupational Clothing Schema
description: Defines clothing items and tags for Occupational Clothing

version.description: The version of the schema used to create the file. This is for handling outdated files.

module.description: The module to search for items that are specified by their short type (Item instead of Module.Item)

items.description: Key-value pairs of items. The key should be the item's type.

professions.description: The professions who should have access to this item. If not specified, all professions can wear this item.

tags.description: Tags for this item. Used to filter items for sandbox options.

files.description: List of other files to load when loading this file.
